title: Ozak AI: The Next 100x Crypto Moonshot?

title: ChatGPT to get parental controls after teen's death
description: American artificial intelligence firm OpenAI has said it would add parental controls to its chatbot ChatGPT, a week after an American couple said the system encouraged their teenage son to kill himself.

title: Marc Benioff Isn't Sold On AGI Hype, Says He's 'Extremely Suspect' Despite AI Shaping Salesforce Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff dismissed hype around artificial general intelligence as "hypnosis," saying today's AI is powerful but not conscious, even as the company cuts jobs, boosts productivity with AI agents, and prepares to report second-quarter earnings.
content:
Salesforce Inc. CRM CEO Marc Benioff is pouring billions into artificial intelligence but says the hype around artificial general intelligence, or AGI, doesn't match reality, even as AI tools transform the company's workforce and sales strategy.

title: China's latest AI gadget is credit card-sized recorder
description: BEIJING — The latest artificial intelligence (AI) gadget in China is a credit-card sized note-taking recorder from Alibaba Group Holding's DingTalk unit, as Chinese firms introduce rival products to Plaud, the popular AI note-taker developed by a US start-up.

title: OpenAI Scoops Up Statsig In $1.1 Billion Deal, CEO Vijaye Raji Joins Applications Unit
description: OpenAI announced on Tuesday that it acquired Statsig, a product experimentation platform, as the artificial intelligence company continues its aggressive acquisition strategy. Statsig CEO Vijaye Raji will join OpenAI as Chief Technology Officer of Applications, reporting to former Instacart CEO Fidji Simo.

title: Croc-detection system using sonar and AI to be trialed in Far North Queensland
description: Boat ramp users could soon be alerted to nearby saltwater crocodiles, with the state government backing the development of a warning system using sonar and artificial intelligence technologies.
content:
A Cairns company will develop and test sonar and artificial intelligence (AI) crocodile detection technology in Far North Queensland waterways to provide real-time warnings of potential threats.

title: From Waiting Tables To Building A $4 Trillion Giant: Meet Jensen Huang, The AI Billionaire Worth Rs 9.91 Lakh Crore, And 7 Other Tech Titans Shaping The Future
description: Artificial Intelligence has created a new league of billionaires, from chipmakers to gaming innovators. Nvidia’s Jensen Huang tops the list with Rs 9.91 lakh crore, after once working as a waiter. Alongside him are young prodigy Alexandr Wang, OpenAI’s Sam Altman, and others who turned algorithms into billion-dollar empires.
